thread.title: Shooter Opens Fire at Oregon College, Kills at Least 10 People
thread.title_full: Shooter Opens Fire at Oregon College, Kills at Least 10 People - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shooter Opens Fire at Oregon College, Kills at Least 10 People
text: Just hours ago, a shooter opened fire at the Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Oregon. Reports say at least 10 people were killed and another 20 were injured. Local law enforcement officers were alerted of the incident at about 10:38 a.m. local time and crews immediately reported at the scene. Students and faculty members were rounded up and taken to a nearby fairground. “At about 10:38 a.m., the 911 center received a report of a shooting at Umpqua Community College... »
